cause.description:
Tigers are rapidly disappearing from this planet because of habitat destruction and poaching. Estimates are that there are fewer than 1000 wild tigers left in the world.
There are numerous groups that are working to educate human populations that live close to tiger habitats so that man and tiger can co-exist peacefully.
1. Environmental Protection
2. Endangered Species Protection
3. Avoid cruelty to animals
cause.mission: Save the diminishing tiger population in the world
cause.name: Save The Tiger
